action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 grid with X's and empty squares. The grid has X's on all edges and some X's in the middle, with the top-right and bottom-right corners having a pattern of empty squares. The second row has X's on both ends and in the middle, with empty squares on either side of the middle X. The grid has a mix of X's and empty squares, with a generally symmetrical pattern around the middle column.
